gameDetails.name: Terraforming Mars: Self-Replicating Robots Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
Self-Replicating Robots

Blue card

Cost: 7

Requirements: 2 Science tags

Action: Reveal and place a SPACE OR BUILDING card here from hand, and place 2 resources on it, OR double the resources on a card here

Effect: Cards may be played as if from hand with the cost (reduced by the number of resources on it)

Promo card 210
